title: Sealfie app

meta.description: Sealfie, the only digital companion protecting against fake president scams. The most lucrative fraud for criminals.

head.title: Protect Your Treasury from Deepfakes!
head.subtitle: Your business is a target for criminals: €5 billion stolen each year. CEO fraud attacks are now undetectable thanks to new AI!
head.subtitle2: With Sealfie, all you need to do is take a photo. We automatically perform multi-source technical verifications for each transaction at the critical moment.

testimonial: Sealfie: Ironclad security meets crystal-clear transparency, powered by Inkan.link's cutting-edge attestation technology.
centeredmsg: As simple as a selfie, automatically secured by cybersecurity experts.
trailer: Business email compromise: the 5 billions annual heist !

post_register.title: Post registration page
post_register.main: Thank you for registering! We will be in touch shortly. Please check your email to validate your registration for our mailing list.

person.title: Simple to Use
person.text: Using Sealfie is as easy as taking a picture with your smartphone.

send.title: Certify All Transactions
send.text: Certify all sorts of transactions, whether physical or digital. Prevent tampering and identity theft.

path.title: Auditable Data
path.text: Your data can be audited and automated, giving you peace of mind that your critical information is certified.

shield.title: Multi-Source Attestation
shield.text: Our patented deeptech solution, engineered to earn unparalleled trust from cybersecurity professionals.

users.title: A Streamlined Process
users.text: Follow Sealfie's process and reduce the stress of not having detected the latest attack method.

cost.title: Pricing
cost.text: Starting at 195 euros/person/year with standard validation and up to 20 validations per year. Custom quotes available for tailored validations, integration with your IT systems, and additional sources.

support.title: Support
support.text: Full support included, no training or integration required. Adaptation to your systems and IT infrastructure available upon request.

period.title: Availability
period.text: Sealfie is available via yearly subscription, cancellable at any time. For large enterprises or specific processes, let's get in touch to adapt our offer to your needs.

onboard.title: Setup
onboard.text: You'll be operational 30 minutes after contacting us. We have minimal integration with IT systems to serve as a defense during an attack.

techno.title: Technology
techno.text: We automatically perform multi-source technical verifications for each transaction at the critical moment. We can extend verification sources upon simple request.

description.title: Revolutionize Your Cybersecurity
description.text: Faced with increasingly sophisticated deepfakes and identity theft, traditional cybersecurity is exhausting: endless training, constant alerts, and complex MFA.
description.text2: Sealfie radically changes the equation: follow ONE simple process instead of knowing ALL possible attacks. A selfie automatically triggers an unbreakable chorus of multi-source attestations, creating protection that even the most advanced fraudsters cannot bypass.
description.text3: Our deeptech technology works behind the scenes to transform each validation into an impregnable fortress, while your teams enjoy a seamless experience as simple as taking a photo.

action.stop: Criminals have automated and improved their attacks.
action.start: Being on permanent red alert is counterproductive.

contactus.main: Contact us to get a subscription.
contactus.custom: We also propose to adapt and co-create services using our technology.

mail.title: Email
mail.feedback: Please enter a valid email address.

phone.title: Phone number
phone.feedback: Please enter a valid phone number.

phonetype.title: Type of phone
phonetype.feedback: Please select your type of phone.

support: To get help, please send a detailed email with your phone number used in the test for us to better understand the issue.

docs.title: Sealfie: How does it work?
docs.subtitle: Following registration after being contacted, the system will be operational within 30 minutes.

stepstart.one: I need to obtain an approval.
stepstart.two: I start Sealfie, take a photo of the subject requiring approval.
stepstart.tree: I take a selfie and add a message (optional).
stepstart.biometric: I confirm using my smartphone's biometrics.

docs.intersteps: The approval request is processed, we automatically add other verifications such as checking for any changes in phone subscription

stepvalidate.two: They verify the photos and the consistency of information.
stepvalidate.tree: Each person validates and adds a selfie.
stepvalidate.biometric: Each person confirms using their smartphone's biometrics.

docs.completed: The requester is guaranteed that only registered persons have approved the request. We have described the simple process, we offer customized solutions
